    • getEdmEntitySet

      public org.apache.olingo.commons.api.edm.EdmEntitySet getEdmEntitySet(org.apache.olingo.server.api.uri.UriInfoResource uriInfo) throws org.apache.olingo.server.api.ODataApplicationException
      Retrieves the EdmEntitySet based on the provided UriInfoResource.
      Parameter:
      uriInfo - the UriInfoResource containing the URI segments
      Gibt zurück:
      the EdmEntitySet
      Löst aus:
      org.apache.olingo.server.api.ODataApplicationException - if the resource type for the first segment is invalid or not supported

    • toOdipProductionOrder

      public org.apache.olingo.commons.api.data.Entity toOdipProductionOrder(ProcessingOrder modelOrder) throws IllegalArgumentException, URISyntaxException
      Create a ODIP interface production order from a prosEO interface processing order. Replace password by "*****"
      Parameter:
      modelOrder - the prosEO model order to convert
      Gibt zurück:
      an OData entity object representing the prosEO interface production order
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any mandatory information is missing from the prosEO interface production order
      URISyntaxException - if a valid URI cannot be generated from any production order UUID

      Parameter:

      Löst aus:

      URISyntaxException - if a valid URI cannot be generated from any production order UUID

    • toOdipWorkflow

      Converts a model workflow to an ODIP workflow entity.
      Parameter:
      modelWorkflow - the model workflow to convert
      Gibt zurück:
      the converted ODIP workflow entity
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the provided model workflow is invalid
      URISyntaxException - if there is an error in the URI syntax

    • toModelOrder

      @Transactional(isolation=REPEATABLE_READ) public de.dlr.proseo.model.rest.model.RestOrder toModelOrder(org.apache.olingo.commons.api.data.Entity order) throws org.apache.olingo.server.api.ODataApplicationException, OdipUtilBase.OdipException
      Converts an ODIP order entity to a model order.
      Parameter:
      order - the ODIP order entity
      Gibt zurück:
      the converted model order
      Löst aus:
      org.apache.olingo.server.api.ODataApplicationException - if there is an error in the OData application
      OdipUtilBase.OdipException - if there is an error in the ODIP application

    • createOrder

      public de.dlr.proseo.model.rest.model.RestOrder createOrder(de.dlr.proseo.model.rest.model.RestOrder order) throws OdipUtilBase.OdipException
      Sends an order to the production planner and releases it.
      Parameter:
      order - The order to be sent and released.
      Gibt zurück:
      The created order after sending and releasing.
      Löst aus:
      OdipUtilBase.OdipException - If an error occurs during the process of sending and releasing the order.

    • findProductByReference

      public Product findProductByReference(String reference)
      Finds a product by its reference.
      Parameter:
      reference - The reference of the product.
      Gibt zurück:

    • findProductsByClassAndStartStop

      public List<Product> findProductsByClassAndStartStop(String productType, Instant start, Instant stop) throws OdipUtilBase.OdipException
      Finds products of a specified class within a given time range.
      Parameter:
      productType - the type of product class to search for
      start - the start time of the range
      stop - the stop time of the range
      Gibt zurück:
      the list of found products
      Löst aus:
      OdipUtilBase.OdipException - if there is an error in the ODIP application
